description:
Front country, backcountry and everywhere in between, the Fireside snap pullover is the kind of cozy you’ll always want nearby. Made from a light and warm recycled polyester fleece, this jacket useful year-round, from cutting the chill after the summer sun turns in, to layered under your shell on winter adventures.

  • Plush midweight polyester fleece
  • Durable woven nylon layers added in high-wear areas
  • Snap placket for easy temperature regulation, and getting it on and off without exposing your toque hair
  • Hanger loop means you only throw it over the back of a chair when you want to
  • Dual handwarmer pockets keep your digits safe from the elements
  • Drop tail hem offers a comfortable coverage
  • Regular fit feels just right
name: MEC Fireside Fleece Snap Pullover - Men's
